modName: Iron Hornless Helmet - amidianBorn Texture Compatible
summary:
This simple fix applies proper amidianBorn iron textures to the iron hornless helmet by defunkt. Original mod required:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21431/?
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description:[/b]

This simple fix applies proper amidianBorn iron textures to the iron hornless helmet by defunkt. Original mod required, find itÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21431/?]HERE[/url] .

[b]Installation:[/b]

Use NMM or just extract the textures folder in the compressed rar archive to your Skyrim/Data folder.

Keep in touch, I might as well apply those to the plate helmet, but I don't use it personally, so who knows.

[b]Recommended for a complete armor look:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22684/?]Iron Variant With Sleeves Chainmail by defunkt[/url][/b]
